TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract FillFormat implements class Microsoft.Office.Core._IMsoDispObj

summary.span: 代表形状的填充格式。

span.span: Represents fill formatting for a shape.

para.span: 形状可以有单色、渐变、纹理、图案、图片或半透明填充。

span.span: A shape can have a solid, gradient, texture, pattern, picture, or semi-transparent fill.

para.span: 使用属性返回对象。

span.span: Use the property to return a object.

para.span: 属性的多个对象是只读的。

span.span: Many of the properties of the object are read-only.

para.span: 若要设置这些属性，必须应用相应的方法。

span.span: To set one of these properties, you have to apply the corresponding method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Excel 应用程序。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the Microsoft Excel application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ BackColor { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回对象，表示指定的填充背景色。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the specified fill background color.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Background() runtime managed

summary.span: 仅供内部使用。

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

para.span: 如果在 Microsoft Excel 中创建对象，此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454c。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.

para.span: Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Excel 具有 XCEL 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ ForeColor { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::ColorFormat ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回对象，表示指定的前景填充色或纯色。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the specified foreground fill or solid color.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float GradientAngle { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定的填充格式的渐变填充角度。

span.span: Gets or sets the angle of the gradient fill for the specified fill format.

value.span: 指定的填充格式的渐变填充角度。

span.span: The angle of the gradient fill for the specified fill format.

para.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 在图表中的各种元素 (形状) 的格式，可以指定渐变填充。

span.span: A gradient fill can be specified in the formatting for various elements (shapes) in a chart.

para.span: 例如，可以使用 数据系列格式对话框中设置为渐变填充的 柱形 图中的列的格式。

span.span: For example, you can use the Format Data Series dialog box to format the columns in a Column chart to a gradient fill.

para.span: 在这种情况下，属性对应于数据系列格式对话框的角度框中填充类别的设置。

span.span: In this case, the property corresponds to the setting of the Angle box in the Fill category of the Format Data Series dialog box.

para.span: 有效值范围属性是从 0 到 359.9。

span.span: The valid range of values for the property is from 0 to 359.9.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GradientColorType As MsoGradientColorType

summary.span: 返回指定填充的渐变颜色类型。

span.span: Returns the gradient color type for the specified fill.

para.span: 可以是下列MsoGradientColorType常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following MsoGradientColorType constants:

para.span: MsoGradientColorMixed是返回的值仅表示指定范围中的其他状态的组合。

span.span: MsoGradientColorMixed is a return value only which indicates a combination of the other states in the specified range.

para.span: 使用， ，或方法可设置填充的渐变类型。

span.span: Use the , , or method to set the gradient type for the fill.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GradientDegree As Single
public: property float GradientDegree { float get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定底纹单色填充的渐变程度的浮点值从 0.0 （暗） 到 1.0 （亮）。

span.span: Returns the gradient degree of the specified one-color shaded fill as a floating-point value from 0.0 (dark) through 1.0 (light).

para.span: GradiantDegree属性是只读的。

span.span: The GradiantDegree property is read-only.

para.span: 使用方法设置填充的渐变程度。

span.span: Use the method to set the gradient degree for the fill.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GradientStops As GradientStops
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::GradientStops ^ GradientStops { Microsoft::Office::Core::GradientStops ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回渐变填充的终点。只读。

span.span: Returns the end point for the gradient fill. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GradientStyle As MsoGradientStyle
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoGradientStyle GradientStyle { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoGradientStyle get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定填充的渐变样式。

span.span: Returns the gradient style for the specified fill.

para.span: 可以是下列MsoGradientStyle常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following MsoGradientStyle constants:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GradientVariant As Integer
public: property int GradientVariant { int get(); };

summary.span: 从 1 到 4，作为整数值返回指定的填充格式的底纹变量。

span.span: Returns the shade variant for the specified fill as an integer value from 1 through 4.

para.span: 此属性的值对应于填充效果对话框中渐变选项卡上的渐变变量 (按从左到右和从上到下的顺序编号)。

span.span: The values for this property correspond to the gradient variants (numbered from left to right and from top to bottom) on the Gradient tab in the Fill Effects dialog box.

para.span: 此属性是只读的。

span.span: This property is read-only.

para.span: 使用或方法设置填充的渐变变量。

span.span: Use the or method to set the gradient variant for the fill.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OneColorGradient (Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoGradientStyle Style, int Variant, float Degree);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OneColorGradient([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoGradientStyle Style, [in]int32 Variant, [in]float32 Degree) runtime managed
Public Sub OneColorGradient (Style As MsoGradientStyle, Variant As Integer, Degree As Single)
public: void OneColorGradient(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoGradientStyle Style, int Variant, float Degree);

param.name: Style
param.span: 所需。可以是下列MsoGradientStyle常量之一：msoGradientDiagonalDown原来为msoGradientFromCentermsoGradientFromCornermsoGradientFromTitlemsoGradientHorizontalmsoGradientMixedmsoGradientVertical

span.span: Required .Can be one of the following MsoGradientStyle constants:msoGradientDiagonalDownmsoGradientDiagonalUpmsoGradientFromCentermsoGradientFromCornermsoGradientFromTitlemsoGradientHorizontalmsoGradientMixedmsoGradientVertical

param.name: Variant

span.span: Required Integer.
The gradient variant.

param.span: 可以是介于 1 至 4，对应于一个填充效果对话框中过渡选项卡上的四个变量的值。

span.span: Can be a value from 1 through 4, corresponding to one of the four variants on the Gradient tab in the Fill Effects dialog box.

param.span: 如果是msoGradientFromCenter，参数只能是 1 或 2。

span.span: If is msoGradientFromCenter, the argument can only be 1 or 2.

param.name: Degree

span.span: Required Single.
The gradient degree.

param.span: 可以是 0.0 之间的值 （暗） 到 1.0 （亮）。

span.span: Can be a value from 0.0 (dark) through 1.0 (light).

summary.span: 将指定填充设置为单色渐变。

span.span: Sets the specified fill to a one-color gradient.

public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

para.span: Pattern属性可以是之一常量。

span.span: The Pattern property can be one of the constants.

para.span: 使用方法设置填充的图案类型。

span.span: Use the method to set the pattern type for the fill.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PictureEffects As PictureEffects
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::PictureEffects ^ PictureEffects { Microsoft::Office::Core::PictureEffects ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值代表指定的填充格式的图片或纹理填充的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the picture or texture fill for the specified fill format.

value.span: 代表指定的填充格式的图片或纹理填充。

span.span: Represents the picture or texture fill for the specified fill format.

para.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

para.span: 在图表中的各种元素 (形状) 的格式，可以指定图片或纹理填充。

span.span: A picture or texture fill can be specified in the formatting for various elements (shapes) in a chart.

para.span: 例如，可以使用 数据系列格式对话框来设置为图片或纹理填充的 柱形图中的列的格式。

span.span: For example, you can use the Format Data Series dialog box to format the columns in a Column chart to a picture or texture fill.

para.span: 在这种情况下，属性返回对应于数据系列格式对话框的填充类别中的图片或纹理填充选项相关联的设置的集合。

span.span: In this case, the property returns a collection that corresponds to the settings associated with the Picture or texture fill option in the Fill category of the Format Data Series dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Transparency { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定填充的透明度作为值从 0.0 （不透明） 到 1.0 （清除）。

span.span: Returns or sets the degree of transparency of the specified fill as a value from 0.0 (opaque) through 1.0 (clear).

para.span: 此属性的值仅影响均一颜色填充和线条的外观。对图案线条及渐变、图案、图片和纹理填充的外观无效。

span.span: The value of this property affects the appearance of solid-colored fills and lines only; it has no effect on the appearance of patterned lines or patterned, gradient, picture, or textured fills.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Visible { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

summary.span: 确定对象是否可见。

span.span: Determines whether the object is visible.

para.span: 可以是下列MsoTriState常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following MsoTriState constants:

para.span: msoTrue对象是可见的。

span.span: msoTrue The object is visible.

para.span: 如果数据透视表中的某一项在当前是可见的，则该项的 Visible 属性为 True。

span.span: The Visible property for a PivotTable item is True if the item is currently visible in the table.

para.span: 如果将一个名称的 Visible 属性设为 False，则该名称将不出现在“定义名称”对话框中。

span.span: If you set the Visible property for a name to False, the name won't appear in the Define Name dialog box.
